author: pherweg
msg: Submitted by: Marc Wilhelm Kuester; added support for fo:list in fo:footnote; ensured Word displays footnote, not endnote

author: bckfnn
msg: Fix a NPE caused by avalonization of logging.
Support for 'results' attribute on 'test' element, used by NIST suite.
Explicit close the output file, otherwise the file has a length of 0
when the files are compared (on windows).
Added -d option to enable debug output.

author: pbwest
msg: Modifications to allow element contents to be buffered
